docs.text: Welcome to Programming Hub A place where your programming skills will be enhanced and improved. Features of Feedback View Post - Member's view post. Add Commnets - Add new comments. View Comments - View Comments. Overview of See a post. 1. See a post Read more - Pressing the Read More button one can see a particular post. Overview of a post. 2. Add comment Add Comment - Pressing the add comment button one can add a comment. First go to add comment page. Then add your name and comment Finally, by clicking add comment button you can submit your comment. Overview Add comment 3. See All comments for a particular post View Commnets - Pressing the button to see all the comments and commenters' name. Here the work is stright-forward. A table will be shown with name and comments for that particular post. Overview See Commnets Contact us Sadman Sakib Email: ssakib191097@bscse.uiu.ac.bd

docs.text: Add Comment - Pressing the add comment button one can add a comment. First go to add comment page. Then add your name and comment Finally, by clicking add comment button you can submit your comment.

docs.text: View Commnets - Pressing the button to see all the comments and commenters' name. Here the work is stright-forward. A table will be shown with name and comments for that particular post.
